sentences.en: Alan has two children, aged eleven and nine.
sentences.cn: 艾伦有两个孩子，分别为11岁和9岁。

sentences.en: All the attackers were male, aged between 25 and 30.
sentences.cn: 所有的攻击者都是男性，年龄在25到30岁之间。

sentences.en: Almost overnight, she had aged ten years and become fat.
sentences.cn: 她几乎一夜之间老了10岁，人也胖了。

sentences.en: Her novels are middle-aged and boring.
His fan base is mostly middle-aged ladies.
sentences.cn: 他的崇拜者大多是中年女士。

sentences.en: His sisters are grown up and his parents are middle-aged.
sentences.cn: 他的姐妹们都已成人，而他的父母亲也人到中年。

sentences.en: Julie and Mark, aged 17 and 19 respectively
sentences.cn: 朱莉和马克，年龄分别为17岁和19岁

sentences.en: Men aged 60 are fighting alongside young boys.
sentences.cn: 年届六十的男人们和少年小伙们并肩作战。

sentences.en: She began modelling in Paris aged 15.
sentences.cn: 她15岁就开始在巴黎做时装模特儿。

sentences.en: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children.
sentences.cn: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

sentences.en: The camp is for youngsters aged 8 to 14.
sentences.cn: 这次夏令营是为8至14岁的少年儿童安排的。

sentences.en: The Georgian, aged 19, is not one of the game's big hitters.
sentences.cn: 这位19岁的佐治亚州人并不是比赛中的优秀击球手之一。

sentences.en: The guests were mostly middle-aged men talking business.
sentences.cn: 顾客多数是些谈正事的中年男子。

sentences.en: The new skin balm was welcome by middle - aged women.
sentences.cn: 这种新护肤香膏受到了 中年 妇女的欢迎.

sentences.en: We need to concentrate on our target audience, namely women aged between 20 and 30.
sentences.cn: 我们须针对我们的听众对象，即年龄在20到30岁之间的妇女。

words.tran_cn: 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段
歧视老年人（尤指在就业和住房方面）
使成熟；使变老，使上年纪
[高分子]年老的；…岁的；老年人特有的

phrases.tran_cn: 随着年龄的增长；因年久

trans.tran_en: You use aged followed by a number to say how old someone is

trans.tran_cn: 老化（age的过去式）；成熟；变老
